basics.name: Nora De la Rosa
basics.label: Senior Customer Service Advisor
basics.summary: Senior Customer Service Advisor with 16 years of experience in customer relations, process optimization, and leadership. Highly proactive and customer-oriented, with strong organizational skills, conflict resolution expertise, and a track record of driving service excellence.

work.name: Klüber Lubricación Mexicana
work.summary: Led critical SAP migration projects, implemented automation solutions, and managed key customer accounts across Central America. Coordinated with logistics, finance, and supply chain teams to deliver high service quality.
highlights: Key User for SAP SD module migration, including user manuals and training delivery.
Achieved 20% reduction in re-invoicing through Six Sigma White Belt project.
Implemented Order Entry Automation using image analysis software.
work.technologies: SAP SD, SAP FI, SupplyOn, eBIZ, Taulia, Plexus, Six Sigma

work.name: Financiera Bepensa
work.summary: Managed automotive credit portfolios, developed agency partnerships, and analyzed financial profiles for vehicle financing.
highlights: Prospected and retained clients for automotive financing solutions.
Built strategic commercial relationships with dealerships.
Performed credit analysis for individuals and corporations.

work.name: Nissan - Shinyu Automotriz
work.summary: Directed financing and insurance operations, supervised a sales team, and improved approval and product penetration rates.
highlights: Achieved >90% approval rate for automotive credits.
Increased financial product penetration above 40% of total sales.
work.technologies: SIA, INTEGRA Systems, Insurance & Credit Management

work.name: Electricentro
work.summary: Managed branch operations and led inventory control projects to optimize processes.
